Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Golden Dolphin Way, behind the archery targets of Dentra Range.
Room.LongDescription: The Dentra Central Archery Range has two separate facilities, one for beginners and another for advanced marksmen (markspeople?). The eastern range is reserved for the advanced archer, so although you are behind the archery targets, it is very unlikely that you will actually get hit by a stray arrow unless you are the target.
